law.catch_line: While a license is in effect, it authorizes the licensee to:...
law.text:
While a license is in effect, it authorizes the licensee to:
operate, in accordance with applicable laws and regulations, a business that provides monitoring services for a fee to individuals who are under a court order that requires monitoring by a private home detention monitoring agency; and
employ qualified individuals to work as private home detention monitors on behalf of the licensee.
